about_the_game:
About "uDesktopMascot"

"uDesktopMascot" is a highly customizable desktop mascot application that brings freedom and personality to your desktop. Users can create their own unique desktop environment by adding files and changing settings to suit their preferences.

Main Features

  • Customizable Character Models

    • Load 3D models in VRM, GLB, and GLTF formats to freely change the appearance of your mascot

    • Place your favorite characters or original models on your desktop

  • Character Voice Settings

    • Replace the character's voice for startup, shutdown, and when the character is tapped

    • Set original audio files to make your mascot more familiar and personalized

  • Interface Customization

    • Change the colors of menus and buttons to suit your taste

    • Replace icon images to create a unique look

  • Other Features

    • Adjust the mascot's position and size

    • Support for multi-display setups

    • Fine-tune settings for transparency and display state

Recommended For

  • Those who want to customize their desktop to reflect their personality

  • Those who wish to feel closer to their favorite characters

  • Those who want to enliven their desktop with 3D models

Create your very own desktop mascot with "uDesktopMascot"!
